answers.answer: How many weeks are you? If you are in you're in your first trimester there isnt much you can do. You actually remind me of myself.... oh how I was sick! It doesnt stay this way, soon the sickness will vanish & you will feel much much better/start to enjoy your pregnancy. You should also speak with your OBGYN if worsens. Btw gingerale used to work well for me. Goodluckk !
Im 16 weeks. With my 1st i used to take dimeatap but my doc said due to my diabetes and being on all that other stuff its not a good idea. I feel horrible and nothing I try is working.
I'm so sorry to hear that uve been feeling so awful! From what I've seen, there should be a light at the end of the tunnel soon for u! Hang in there! The sickness won't last forever!
I would ask your Dr first but my doc told me I could take robitussin dm but only the one that is DM and its safe.it was thing only thing that helped my cough and allowed me to sleep.good luck

I am in my 3rd week and all of sudden I got sick with a sinus infection and a fever and I had heartburn bad and  acid reflux with a side of head aches, next thing I know I was fine...so I do understand where you are right now hang in there

question: How do you deal with it? Both my ears and sinuses are infected, I cant stop coughing, my chest and upper back are really hurting when I breathe, im hot then cold then hot again, and im throwing up. Im on 500 mg keflex, 4mg zofran, taking cough drops and tums but nothing is getting better.... only worse. Ive tried crackers, 7up, soup, hot showers, chugging water and still nothing. Any ideas on how to just feel a little better?
title: Anyone else been SUPER sick?
